Itâ€™s a sad day for me as I just found out Tom Verlaine from Television has died. The album Marquee Moon absolutely changed my life. To quote from â€œProve Itâ€ which also includes my favorite guitar solo of all time:

Now the rose
How it slows
You in such colorless clothes
Fantastic! You lose your sense of human
Project
Protect
Itâ€™s warm and itâ€™s calm and itâ€™s perfect
Itâ€™s too â€œtoo tooâ€
To put a finger on

Honestly thereâ€™s no a single wrong note in the whole 46 minutes of the albumâ€™s runtime. If you ever wondered how does a snake gets out of its skin, the song â€œFrictionâ€ has a depiction. Everyone should listen to this album at least once in their lives. Seriously.

RIP old Tom.
